official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Black Creek in Mississippi as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Black Creek in Mississippi as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
